A new form of super lice appear to be making a hair raising come back. They're stronger they're smarter and they are resistant to the most common treatments on the market. They even learn how to Alter their angling cycles getting rid of them these days is a nightmare. Parents have to take their kids to clinics for these special combat treatments.
